welcomeSec.title: Welcome to our coffee house
welcomeSec.description: From a cultural standpoint, coffeehouses largely serve as centers of social interaction: the coffeehouse provides patrons with a place to congregate, talk, read, write, entertain one another, or pass the time, whether individually or in small groups.

delightSec.description: The coffee is brewed by first roasting the green coffee beans over hot coals in a brazier. Once the beans are roasted, each participant is given an opportunity to sample the aromatic smoke by wafting it towards them. This is followed by the grinding.

coffeeMenu.title: Coffee Menu
coffeeMenu.description: “I’m looking to nature for my inspiration. Letting the natural produce speak. There’s so much out there, so much elegance and beauty.” – PETER GILMORE

Footer.description: CafféLine is your digital hub for discovering and ordering the finest coffee blends. Explore our curated menu, stay updated with the latest offerings, and enjoy seamless online ordering.

AboutPage.title: About CafféLine
AboutPage.subtitle: Our Story
AboutPage.description: CafféLine started with a passion for the finest coffee and a vision to create a cozy space where everyone can enjoy their favorite brew. From sourcing the best beans to crafting unique flavors, we dedicate ourselves to delivering an exceptional coffee experience.
AboutPage.missionText: To bring the highest quality coffee to our community while maintaining sustainability and ethical sourcing.
AboutPage.visionText: To be the most loved coffee destination where quality, taste, and experience come together.
AboutPage.teamText: Our baristas and staff are passionate coffee lovers, trained to craft your perfect cup every time.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.name: Your Name
contact.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent.

drinks.title: Iced Coffee
drinks.subtitle: ESPRESSO BLEND
drinks.description: Delicate crispy taste of the finest coffee grains is combined with fresh creamy milk, poured right on cooling ice for serving.

drinks.title: Black Tea
drinks.subtitle: Premium Leaves
drinks.description: Rich and aromatic black tea brewed from the finest tea leaves, offering a perfect balance of flavor and aroma.

drinks.title: Latte
drinks.subtitle: MILK & ESPRESSO
drinks.description: Smooth and creamy latte made with perfectly steamed milk and fresh espresso for a balanced flavor.
